title: Preservation of Image Content in Stain-to-stain Translation for Digital Pathology
details: B Huang, W Benjeddou, NS Schaadt, J Lotz… - BVM Workshop, 2025
abstract: In digital pathology, unsupervised domain adaptation of differently stained whole- slide images (WSIs) through image-to-image translation has become increasingly important for various applications such as stain augmentation or for the stain …
